name: Kruc
content:
Kruc was a male Kitonak who lived on the planet Cularin during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.
During the Clone Wars in around 20 BBY, Kruc owned a landspeeder and, was present with it outside a restaurant in Gadrin, when he was passed by a speeder containing the Sullustan Imik Suum and another speeder that was pursuing Suum.
In In the Name of the Maker, it is possible for the player characters to persuade Kruc to help them chase after Suum's pursuers.
